Name: RedfishServer Message Registry
Description: This registry defines the messages for RedfishServer.

ExtendedInfo.Description: Indicates that extended information is available.

InvalidOperationForSystemState.Description: The operation was not successful due to the current power state (for example, attempting to turn the power off when it is already off).
InvalidOperationForSystemState.Message: The operation was not successful due to the current power state.
InvalidOperationForSystemState.Resolution: Verify that the system is in the correct power state, and then retry the operation.

UnauthorizedLoginAttempt.Description: The login was not successful, because the supplied credentials could not be authorized.
UnauthorizedLoginAttempt.Message: The login was not successful, because the supplied credentials could not be authorized.
UnauthorizedLoginAttempt.Resolution: Log in with authorized user name and password credentials.
